item.header: The Role of the Game Master

box.text: The Role of the Game Master The Game Master is a storyteller and a referee, creator of terrible threats against humanity, secret master of the villainous, criminal and insane, and hidden protector of the brave. The GM's responsibilities include three important tasks.

item.text: First and foremost, a game session is a story. It should makean ending. After you set the adventure in motion, the players help provide what happens in the middle and how the conclusion plays out.
The GM develops the campaign world, either using one from athe backdrop and the story that unfolds.
